attributes.description: A sleep sack is like a mini sleeping bag for your baby and toddler. Examples include Swaddle Sleepsack, Weighted Sleep Sack, Sleepsack, Baby Sleep Suit, etc.
The distance from the shoulder to the bottom hem of the sleeve, measured in inches.
Describes the density or weight of fabric material. Examples: Heavyweight, Lightweight, Mid-Weight.
The type of fastener used to keep an item closed and to facilitate putting on the item.
If designed for a specific time of year, the appropriate season this item may be used.
